definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Pers. perfect. in Syria;—Ezr 5:3, Ezr 5:6, Ezr 6:6, Ezr 6:13; Qanqanav, A Qaqqanai; LXXL Tanqanaiov, Sisinnhv; also 3 Esdr 6:3, 7:26 Jos:Ant. xi. 12, 89, etc. (Lag:Psalt. Hieron.162 n.; AS:§135 n.; Mey:Entst. J. 32 assumes OP * Thithnaya, or *Thathnaia); but Uštanni, Uštanu, was prefect in Syria under Darius, acc. to contr. tablets. v. Strassm:Darius 27, 82; names prob. identical; Meissn:ZAW xvii (1897), 191 f. reads therefore [[ושׁתני]] ([[וַשְׁתָּנִי]] Hpt), cf. Buhl Gu:Ezr-Ne 63; Scheft:94, however, thanks [[תתני]] = [[תסני]] OP thāsna, Av. sāsna (teaching), and this transp. in NBab. Uštanu
